Name: Decent Holy Fountain
Desc:
Summons a holy fountain that heals HP for party members, including those in Undead state. To recover HP, approach the fountain and press [Up].
Only 1 Holy Fountain and 1 Decent Holy Fountain used by you and your party can exist in the same map.
If Decent Holy Fountain disappears before its duration, it leaves Holy Traces. Can't be used on maps with party members' Holy Fountain, Decent Holy Fountain, and Holy Traces.
Not affected by Cooldown Reset, Recovery Skill Efficiency Increase, or SUMMONS DURATION INCREASE effects. Can't be summoned near portals.
